content:
AllocationState AllocationState Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Azure.Batch.dll

Indicates whether a pool is resizing.

Edit

In this Article

public enum AllocationStatePublic Enum AllocationState

Fields

Resizing Resizing

The pool is resizing; that is, compute nodes are being added to or removed from the pool.
Steady Steady

The pool is not resizing. There are no changes to the number of nodes in the pool in progress.
Stopping Stopping

The pool was resizing, but the user has requested that the resize be stopped, but the stop request has not yet been completed.
